thread.section_title: FlightHub Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of FlightHub | flighthub.com | 4 of 1708
thread.title: Philip

author: Philip
title: Philip
text:
We wanted to fly into SFO and return to Montreal from Las Vegas.
Using Flighthub was very easy. The only hiccup was that on the final page I realized I had bought trip cancellation insurance which I thought I had said no. Once on the last page it seems to be to late to make changes.
My wife liked the insurance so all is good.
Check and recheck is what we must do when booking via internet. Everything goes fast and gets locked up.
